metadata.title: Real Kids Shades Wayfarers
features: ADVENTURE SUNGLASSES: Finally you’ve found them—stylish kids’ sunglasses your children will love! Our rugged design stands up to your child’s toughest adventures. They’ll love the cool design of the frame and the fun color choices we offer.

POLARIZED SUNGLASSES: These sunglasses feature high-quality polarized lenses. The shatterproof polycarbonate lenses on these shades provide exceptional optical clarity and reduce eye strain. Polarized sunglasses are also especially good protection from intense, glaring outdoor light caused by the sun on water or snow.

UNBREAKABLE GLASSES: Lightweight lenses provide not only optical clarity, but also impact resistance. These glasses are also Rx compatible for use with prescription lenses. The sturdy wrap frame will bend and flex, but it won’t break! Our ultraflexible glasses are made for comfortable regular wear.

100% UVA/UVB PROTECTION: Our stylish sunglasses aren’t just fashion forward and fun—they’re also specifically designed to protect your child’s eyes. They offer 100% UVA and UVB protection to keep your little one’s eyes safe from the sun.

THE REAL SHADES MISSION: Since 2002, we’ve made it our mission to protect as many eyes as possible from the damaging effects of UV radiation by specializing in stylish, fun sunglasses with unbreakable frames and ophthalmic-quality lenses. Backed by our Real Guarantee.
description: Bend ‘em, flex ‘em, you can’t break ‘em! Do you have an active child who spends a lot of time outdoors, or does your family enjoy doing things like going to the beach or taking long walks through the park? Then your little one needs our Adventure sunglasses.

The unbreakable, flex fit, wrap around frame minimizes exposure to peripheral light while the soft, adjustable strap ensures these glasses will be comfortable and stay put no matter what. The shatterproof Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight while providing excellent impact resistance and optical clarity.

Think of it as sunscreen for the eyes. Children’s eyes are more sensitive and have a higher risk of permanent sun damage than grownups, but not all sunglasses provide the proper protection. As with skin, sun damage is cumulative, irreparable and can happen any time of year.
Our quality children’s sunglasses provide full spectrum UV protection, meaning both 100% UVA and UVB protection,
so that your little one’s eyes are protected from the sun’s damaging rays every day.
Protecting your children is our top priority.
Our Adventure sunglasses are available with a high quality polarized lens we call P2 (Polarized + Polycarbonate).
Polarized lenses eliminate glare, increase visual clarity, reduce eye strain and enhance contrast.

These lenses are especially advantageous to combat intense glare experienced on the water or on the snow.  Don’t need Polarized lenses? No problem! Our regular lenses also feature shatterproof Polycarbonate and provide just as much protection. You can choose which one you prefer above under Sizing.
